attributes.action: Free parking for all tradesmen and women.
attributes.additional_details: Make this change to help local trades people and All trades and businesses.
attributes.background: All trades should be allowed to park outside the customer home for free without getting fined if the home owner doesn't have a parking permit

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local parking restrictions are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
